levels.description: Immediately generates a lightning storm centered on the target with the highest HP within a wide range, lasting for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds; Deals an additional attack equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK to a random enemy within the lightning storm every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds; <@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charges</>
